p: On an average, larch needles grow upto 30 mm in length, lengthier needles being an indicator of good health. The current health of the plant which depends upon its nutrient supply and its previous state after the last budmoth infestation is hence captured well through a dimensionless Plant Quality Index (PQI) which is directly related to the needle length 9 (see Methods). Turchin’s model 8 had tightly tuned parameters, adjusted to match the observed 9 year budmoth cycle.
